sentences.en: A jay emerged from the juniper bush in a flash of blue feathers.
sentences.cn: 只见亮闪闪的蓝色羽毛一闪，一只松鸦从刺柏丛中钻了出来。

sentences.en: Conifer hedge such as yew, juniper, redwood, etc.
sentences.cn: 针叶树篱,如紫杉 、 刺柏 、 红木等.

sentences.en: Conifer shrub style such as juniper, yew, pine, etc.
sentences.cn: 针叶灌木类,如刺柏 、 紫杉 、 松树等.

sentences.en: Conifer tree style such as pine, fir, spruce, redwood, juniper, etc.
sentences.cn: 针叶类树包括松树 、 杉树 、 云杉 、 红木 、 刺柏, 等等.

sentences.en: Few perfumes are as seductive as the aroma of the juniper berry.
sentences.cn: 很少有香味能够如杜松子的芳香一般诱人.

sentences.en: He just lived for his daily ounce of juniper juice.
sentences.cn: 他活着就是想每天都能喝几口杜松子酒.

sentences.en: Ingredients: Juniper berry , Grapetfruit, Patchouli , Aniseed, Ginger, Ivy.
sentences.cn: 成份: 杜松子, 葡萄柚,广霍香, 洋茴香, 僵, 常春藤.

sentences.en: Juniper Berry - Wonderful oil for detoxification!
sentences.cn: 杜松- 最好的排毒精油!

sentences.en: Observation on Roots and Experiment on Root Cutting for Juniper.
sentences.cn: 杜松根系观察及切根试验的研究.

sentences.en: Preceding flavor: Sweet lemon, Chinese orange, Field mint, Lavender, Chinese juniper berry.
sentences.cn: 前味: 香柠檬 、 中国柑桔 、 薄荷 、 熏衣草 、 刺柏浆果.

sentences.en: Rosemary, Basil, Juniper , Wheat Gem Oil Refined and so on.
sentences.cn: 迷迭香 、 罗勒 、 杜松 、 小麦胚芽油等.

sentences.en: Sharp arrows of the mighty, with coals of juniper.
sentences.cn: 4就是勇士的利箭, 和罗腾木(小树名松类)的炭火.

sentences.en: The juniper is a type of evergreen bush with purple berries.
sentences.cn: 杜松子是一种生有紫红色浆果的常绿灌木.

sentences.en: The usual evergreens are pine, juniper and cedar.
sentences.cn: 通常的常绿树有松, 柏,雪松.

sentences.en: We walked on frosted fields of juniper and lamp light.
sentences.cn: 我们走过洒满灯光的霜雪覆盖的松林大地.

words.tran_cn: [林]杜松；桧或刺柏属植物；（美）[植]桧状植物（多用于装饰）

trans.tran_cn: 刺柏属丛木或树木，刺柏，杜松，（美）桧状植物（多用于装饰）
trans.tran_en: a small bush that produces purple berries that can be used in cooking
